Articles.Content:
Just to clarify, I can install making history without problem, but when it comes to breaking ground the installer fails right away. It's done it to me for the last few versions of KSP, even in administrator mode. It's the non Steam, portable version.

error reads-

Spoiler

(file location)/LegalNotice.txt

An error occurred while trying to rename a file in the destination directory:
MoveFile failed; code 5.
Access is denied.

(click retry, etc.)

 

Edited June 25, 2021 by Logical Lucario
